Spells:
Accelerate Poison (D2 Tran): Poison affecting touched takes effect immediately or inflicts damage twice as often for half duration
Aqueous Orb (D3 Conj): R200' 10' diameter sphere douses normal fires and acts as Dispel Magic on magical ones, inflicts 2d6 HP nonlethal (DC 13 Ref neg) and engulfs (DC 13 Ref neg), moves 30'/rd and rolls over 10' obstacles for 10 rd
Aspect Of The Bear (D2 Tran): Self gains +2 AC and CMB, does not provoke AOO on bull rush, grapple, and overrun for 10 min
Aspect Of The Falcon (D1 Tran): Self gains +3 Perception, +1 ranged attack, and crit of 19-20/x3 w/bows and crossbows for 10 min
Aspect Of The Stag (D4 Tran): Self gains +2 AC vs. AOO, +20 Speed, full speed in undergrowth, and immediate attack w/antlers (+14 1d8-2 HP piercing 19-20/x2) after successful foe AOO for 10 min
Aspect Of The Wolf (D5 Tran): Self gains +4 Strength and Dexterity, Scent feature, +2 trip attack, and swift trip w/out provoking AOO for 10 min
Ball Lightning (D4 Evoc): R200' 2 5' spheres fly 20'/rd, inflict 3d6 HP electricity (DC 14 Ref neg; -4 in metal armor) in same square for 10 rd
Blessing Of Courage and Life (C2 Conj): R50' Target gains +2 save vs. fear and death for 10 min; target may end to regain 1d8+10 HP
Blessing Of Fervor (C4 Tran): R50' 10 targets in 15' radius gain choice each rd from: +30 Speed; stand as swift action w/out provoking AOO; extra attack as part of full-attack action; +2 attack, AC, and Reflex; or use metamagic for free w/spell up to level 2 for 10 rd
Blessing Of The Salamander (D5 Tran): Touched gains fast healing 5, fire resistance 20, and +2 CMD for 10 rd
Bloody Claws (D4 Necr): Touched inflicts +5 HP bleed w/natural slashing or piercing attack for 10 min
Bristle (D1 Tran): Touched may trade up to 3 natural armor bonus for equal damage bonus each rd for 10 min
Burning Gaze (D2 Evoc): R30' Self inflicts 1d6 HP fire/rd on chosen target (DC 12 Ref ends) each rd for 10 rd
Call Animal (D1 Ench): Nearest wild animal of chosen type (CR 10 max) moves toward self for 10 hr
Clashing Rocks (D9 Conj): R800' Ranged touch inflicts 20d6 HP bludgeoning, knocked prone, and buried in rubble (DC 19 Ref not buried); missed target and creatures in path suffer 10d6 HP and knocked prone (DC 19 Ref half HP only)
Cleanse (C5 Evoc): Self regains 4d8+10 HP, recovers from ability damage and conditions, and breaks one enchantment
Cloak Of Shade (D1 Abju): 10 touched treat heat from sunlight as 1 level less severe and reduce penalties from sunlight by 1 for 10 hr
Cloak Of Winds (D3 Abju): R50' Foes of target suffer -4 ranged attacks; Tiny foes cannot touch target, are pushed 50', and suffer 3d6 HP nonlethal (DC 13 Fort neg) for 10 min
Cup Of Dust (D3 Tran): R50' Target suffers dehydration (DC 13 Fort neg) for 10 dy
Detect Aberration (D1 Divi): R800' Cone gives self info on aberrations for conc or 100 min
Eagle Eye (D2 Divi): R800' Self can view from higher point for 10 min
Expeditious Excavation (D1 Tran): R50' Moves 5' cu of dirt; creatures on top fall into pit (DC 11 Ref neg)
Feast Of Ashes (D2 Tran): R50' Target suffers starvation (DC 12 Fort neg) and eating causes 1 rd nausea (DC 12 Fort neg) for 20 dy
Fire Snake (D5 Evoc): Adjacent 10 contiguous 5' sq w/in 60' inflict 10d6 HP fire (DC 15 Ref half)
Geyser (D4 Conj): R800' 5' sq inflicts 3d6 HP fire and 5d6 falling (DC 14 Ref half fire only), and surrounding 25' radius inflicts 1d6 HP fire, for conc + 1 rd
Glide (D2 Tran): Self falls 60'/rd and may move horizontally 300'/rd for 10 min
Grace (C2 Abju): Self movement provokes no AOO for 1 rd
Grove Of Respite (D4 Conj): R50' Creates 20' radius grove that reports intruders and provides water and fruit that feeds 8 and heals 1 HP for 20 hr
Guiding Star (C3 Divi): Self aware of direction and distance to casting location for 10 dy
Hide Campsite (D3 Illu): R50' 20' cu covers camp activity (DC 13 Will neg on interaction) for 20 hr
Hydraulic Push (D1 Evoc): R50' Target suffers CMB +13 bull rush; extinguishes normal fire up to 5' sq
Hydraulic Torrent (D3 Evoc): Creatures in 60' line suffer CMB +13 bull rush; immovable objects 13 Strength to break; extinguishes normal fires
Instant Armor (C2 Conj): Self gains effects of half-plate or magical lesser armor for 10 min
Life Bubble (C5 Abju): 10 touched breathe freely, comfortable from -40F to 150F, and unaffected by pressure for 20 hr total
Lily Pad Stride (D3 Tran): R800' Self moves across liquid and others can follow w/DC 10 Acrobatics (half speed; full speed inflicts -5 Acrobatics) for 100 min
Lockjaw (D2 Tran): Touched gains +4 CMB to grapple w/out provoking AOO after hit w/natural weapon for 10 rd
Moonstruck (D4 Ench): R200' Target suffers dazed for 1 rd, then suffers confused and gains bite attack, two claw attacks, and rage for 8 rd, then suffers dazed for 1 rd (DC 14 Will neg)
Natural Rhythm (D2 Tran): Touched gains +1 cumulative damage using natural attacks (max +5, miss resets to +0) for 10 rd
Nature's Exile (D3 Tran): Touched suffers permanent hostility from natural animals and -10 Survival, and animal companion suffers -2 attack, skill checks, and saves (DC 13 Will neg)
Pillar Of Life (C5 Conj): R200' Creatures regain 2d8+10 HP (undead suffer 10d6 HP (light-sensitive 10d8)) on first contact w/5' sq for 10 rd
Pox Pustules (D2 Necr): R50' Target suffers sickened and -4 Dexterity (DC 12 Fort neg; full-round scratch neg sickened for 1 rd) for 10 min
Rampart (D7 Conj): R200' Creates 5'x10'x50' linear or 5'x13' radius circular earthen wall (Hardness 0; 180 HP; DC 20 Climb; DC 60 Strength to break)
Rest Eternal (D5 Necr): Touched corpse requires DC 21 caster check to communicate, resurrect, or animate
River Of Wind (D4 Evoc): 5'x120' line inflicts 4d6 HP nonlethal and knocked prone (DC 14 Fort half HP only), then 2d6 HP nonlethal, pushed 20', and knocked prone (DC 14 Fort 1d6 HP only) for 9 rd
Sacred Bond (C3 Conj): Self and touched may cast touch healing spells on each other at R50' for 100 min
Scent Trail (D2 Tran): R50' 10 designated creatures in 15' radius gain +20 Survival to follow target trail and understand scent messages for 10 hr
Seamantle (D8 Conj): 30' water column hinders fire spells and gives self +8 AC, +4 Reflex, 30' slam attack, and touch that extinguishes fires for 10 min
Shifting Sand (D3 Tran): R200' 10' radius earth or sand moves 10'/rd, creates difficult terrain, inflicts -10 Acrobatics, and entangles and knocks prone (DC 13 Ref neg) for 10 rd
Sirocco (D6 Evoc): R200' 60' high, 20' radius inflicts 4d6+10 HP fire, fatigues, and knocks prone (DC 16 Fort half HP and neg knocked prone; flying creatures DC 15 Fly to avoid) for 10 rd
Slipstream (D2 Conj): Creates wave that moves touched 10'/rd (20' downhill) and gives +20' Swim for 100 min
Snake Staff (C5 Tran): R200' Transforms up to 10 sticks in 15' radius into telepathically controlled snakes for 10 rd
Spiritual Ally (C4 Evoc): R200' Force being moves 30'/rd and makes +14/+9/+4 attacks inflicting 1d10+3 HP for 10 rd (DC d20+10 SR ends)
Stone Call (D2 Conj): R200' 40' radius inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning for 1 rd, then difficult terrain for 9 rd
Stormbolts (C8 Evoc): Targets in 30' radius suffer 10d8 HP electricity and stunned 1 rd (DC 18 Fort half HP only)
Strong Jaw (D4 Tran): Touched natural weapon inflicts damage as +2 size for 10 min
Swarm Skin (D6 Tran): Self flesh transforms into controlled insect swarms until destroyed or ordered to return to bones
Threefold Aspect (D5 Tran): Self may transform freely between young (+2 Dexterity and Constitution, -2 Wisdom), adult (+2 Wisdom and Intelligence, -2 Dexterity), and elderly (+4 Wisdom and Intelligence, -2 Strength and Dexterity) for 1 dy
True Form (D4 Abju): R200' Removes polymorph effects from 3 targets in 15' radius (DC 14 Will neg for polymorph ability, DC 11+effect level for polymorph spell) for 10 rd
Tsunami (D9 Conj): R800' 10'x10'x20' wave moves 30'/60'/rd over land/water, inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 19 Fort half), +21 CMB to knock down and sweep away for 5 rd
Vortex (D7 Evoc): R800' 15' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 17 Ref neg) on first contact, then 1d8 HP/rd on Medium and smaller (DC 17 Ref neg) for 9 rd; self may eject creatures from vortex
Wall Of Lava (D8 Conj): R200' Creates 10 contiguous 5' sq wall sections for 10 rd; foe strike inflicts 2d6 HP fire on weapon; passage (DC 25 Strength) inflicts 20d6 HP fire; R60' ranged touch inflicts 10d6 HP fire and destroys 1d4 sections 1/rd; half damage continues for 1d3 rd
Weapon Of Awe (C2 Tran): Touched weapon or unarmed strike gains +2 damage and crit inflicts 1 rd shaken for 10 min
Winds Of Vengeance (C9 Evoc): Self gains 60' fly and immunity to wind, gas, and ranged weapons; inflicts on attackers 5d8 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (DC 19 Fort half HP only), for 10 min
World Wave (D9 Tran): Self rides 20'x10' natural terrain oval that forms 30' wave for 10 rd or 5' swell for 10 hr, moves 160'/rd, and inflicts 6d6 (wave) or 1d6 (swell) HP bludgeoning to non-natural objects (constructs and undead suffer dbl HP)
Wrathful Mantle (C3 Evoc): Touched gains +2 saves for 10 min; target may dismiss to inflict 2d8 HP force to creatures in 5' radius
Magic Notes:
Charisma Channel Energy Adjustment: +3
Greater Elemental Focus (Acid): Increased Elemental Focus (Acid) effects
Arcane Beacon: 15' radius gives arcane spells +1 caster level or DC for 1 rd 3/dy
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Channel Energy: R30' Heal or inflict 5d6 HP (DC 18 Will half) 6/dy
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Dispelling Touch: Dispel Magic touch attack 1/dy
Elemental Focus (Acid): +2 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
Master's Illusion: 30' radius Veil (DC 15 Will disbelieve) for 10 rd/dy
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: Cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Spontaneous Druid Spell: Cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
Wild Shape: Change into creature of size diminutive-huge/large elemental/plant for 10 hr 4/dy
